column2: "The aftermath of some battle? There are pieces of guard mechs all over. I don't want to look at it..."
"I didn't think there was anyone this brutal among the ARKS. It's pretty frightening when you think about it."
"Oh, it's nothing. I was just worried about them."
"On Lillipa, there's really nothing but guard mechs and Darkers."
"So the Lillipans are pretty much surrounded by enemies."
"That... and we ARKS aren't exactly allies, either."
"With all this fighting, it's no wonder they would run off."
"Sorry, I guess I went off on a tangent there."
"We're not their enemy. If we don't tell them that from the start, then we'll never get to know them."
"Since we already met, it would be a shame if we weren't able to get along."
